system.availability: A Device that buries itself within the Character and attaches to their Heart. Each time the character is wounded the character is pulsed with agonising ecstasy and adrenaline, gaining +1d5 Temporary Agility, which may change their movement and initiative order, until the end of the encounter. At the end of combat suffer 1d5 Fatigue if this activated.
system.cost: Must be Dedicated to Slaanesh to use. Once implanted cannot be removed without requiring a Bionic Heart Replacement. Xenotech.
